flawed_nl_solution:
A single seed costs $.005 because 0.5 / 100 = <<0.5/100=0.01>>0.01
It costs $.02 cents to grow an ear of corn because 0.01 x 4 = <<0.01*4=0.02>>0.02
On each ear of corn he makes $.098 profit because 0.1 - 0.02 = 0.8
He sold 500 ears because 40 / 0.8 = <<40/0.8=50>>50
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.08, not 0.8. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
